Our latest reminder that celebrities are just like us comes from Jimmy Kimmel's Mother's Day segment.
Emily Blunt, Gwyneth Paltrow, Renée Zellweger, Lakeith Stanfield, Will Arnett, Aidy Bryant, and more shared funny texts they received from their mothers.
P… [+866 chars]

articles.author: David Oliver
articles.title: 'The pain is relentless': Queen guitarist Brian May hospitalized after tearing buttocks while gardening - USA TODAY
articles.description: Queen guitarist Brian May doesn't have coronavirus – but he did need to go to the hospital after he tore his buttocks gardening.
articles.content:
Queen guitarist Brian May had to go to the hospital   but not for coronavirus.
The cause? He tore his buttocks while gardening. Yes, seriously.
"Reality check ! For me. No - the Virus didnt get me yet - thank God. Hope youre all keeping extra-safe out there… [+1162 chars]

articles.title: Elon Musk and Grimes reveal how to pronounce baby's name -- but they disagree - CNN
articles.description: Elon Musk and Grimes have garnered plenty of attention since announcing the name of their newborn baby, but now it seems they can't agree on how it should be pronounced.

articles.title: National Treasure TV series planned for Disney+, will arrive with third theatrical film - Hindustan Times
articles.description: A third theatrical film in the National Treasure franchise is being planned. It will arrive simultaneously with a spinoff series for Disney Plus.
articles.content: A series based on the Nicolas Cage-starrer National Treasure films is being developed at Disney Plus. The revelation was made by Jerry Bruckheimer, who produced both the original 2004 movie and its 2007 sequel, National Treasure: Book of Secrets, during an in… [+715 chars]
